DOC.brief_summary: This is an exploratory study to assess whether vildagliptin, an unapproved drug, can increase insulin secretion in subjects with pre-diabetes who have a defect in the insulin response and elevated levels of fasting glucose.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Effects of Vildagliptin on the Insulin Response to Glucose in Subjects With Pre-diabetes
DOC.criteria: BMI in the range 2245 and with a stable weight for the last 6 months Blood glucose criteria must be met Written informed consent Pregnancy or lactation Previous diagnosis of type 2 diabetes or treatment with hypoglycemic agents Type 1 diabetes Evidence of cardiovascular complications as defined by the protocol Evidence of diabetic complications as defined by the protocol
